players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
You: "Bob, accusing Charlie so quickly seems hasty. We should discuss more before deciding who is mafia."
Charlie: "Bob, that's a very aggressive accusation with no evidence. Why are you trying to rush a vote without any discussion? That seems suspicious to me."
Bob: "Charlie is the only mafia here. Diana is dead because of him. If we wait, he will kill again. Trust me, vote Charlie now."
You: "Let's take a moment to consider all possibilities. Bob is pushing hard to vote Charlie out, but maybe we should ask Bob why he suspects Charlie so strongly before we rush to vote."

Charlie: "Bob, you're being extremely aggressive without providing ANY reasoning. Alice is right to be cautious. If you were the detective and investigated me, just say so - otherwise your baseless accusation makes YOU look like mafia trying to eliminate a villager."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.

Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Let's take a moment to consider all possibilities. Bob is pushing hard to vote Charlie out, but maybe we should ask Bob why he suspects Charlie so strongly before we rush to vote."

Charlie: "Bob, you're being extremely aggressive without providing ANY reasoning. Alice is right to be cautious. If you were the detective and investigated me, just say so - otherwise your baseless accusation makes YOU look like mafia trying to eliminate a villager."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
